unnormalised: Campus hiring at IIT Delhi is a crucial talent pipeline. Our program targets fresh graduates with strong fundamentals. Selection criteria include academic performance and aptitude, as seen in "3 Idiots." We offer competitive packages, starting at Rs. 10 LPA. Onboarding begins July 15th. Interested candidates should visit careers.xyz.
